TopicTitle: Alt + Tab during loading of saved game from main menu causes inoperability

Articles.Content:
If you alt + tab out of the game whilst loading a save from the main menu screen then the following view is loaded and none of the buttons work. The only way to proceed is to press Alt + F4 and load the game again. I was told this is a very old bug so it should already be known and shouldn't require much further information.

Windows 7 Home Premium 64-Bit, KSP 1.1.2 64-bit, Kerbal Alarm Clock installed but it's an old version and it doesn't work and I haven't bothered to install the latest version.

 

 

 

Edited June 8, 2016 by THX1138

Open debug menu (alt+f12).
Clear input lock stack.
